short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presenting booking time slots in a simple and easy way on Booksy.com
short.pl: Czytelna prezentacja godzin usług (do rezerwacji) dla aktualnie przeglądanego salonu w Booksy.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension lists possible booking time slots per employee on the sidebar for currently viewed business page on Booksy.com service. Usually one must click through all dates and hours ranges to see possible options. And this takes time. This is where this extension comes in.

How it works:
- enter specific business page on booksy.com,
- right sidebar should load already some default data,
- change date start/end if needed,
- pick service variant using drop down and search feature,
- all available time slots (for selected time range) per staff are reloaded in the sidebar.

Created it for myself and decided to share the solution.

Easy Booksy is in no way affiliated with Booksy.com.
long.pl:
This simple extension lists possible booking time slots per employee on the sidebar for currently viewed business page on Booksy service. Usually one must click  through all dates and hours ranges to see all possible hours. This is where this extension comes in.

Top filters:
- date from
- date to
- service variant (haircut only or beard included etc)

Created it for myself and decided to share the solution. Enjoy.
